CustomField.description:
The date when a User last did something related to the record (represents one of the following): - The latest Due Date of the Closed Tasks on a record. - The latest Start Date of Events on a record.
Example: If a Record has multiple Activities, the "Last Activity" date will be the Due Date of the Activity furthest in the future. If the Activity Due Dates are 1/10/2018 and 2/10/2018, the Last Activity will be 2/10/2018.
CustomField.label: Last Activity
